round_best: Introduce a dual-path neural network framework that leverages both unsupervised learning and supervised fine-tuning for enhanced camera pose estimation. The first path uses an unsupervised autoencoder trained to reconstruct scene imagery and extract robust, invariant features from various environmental conditions. The second path, supervised and finely tuned with labeled pose data, learns to translate these features directly into accurate camera poses, improving localization precision even in dynamically changing environments.
